meanings.definition: To trump (a card) with a higher trump card.
meanings.sent1: During the game, I will overruff your card with my best trump card.
meanings.sent2: She always manages to overruff her opponents with clever strategies.
meanings.sent3: In the card game, I will overruff your move and win the round!
meanings.sent4: Her quick thinking allowed her to overruff the competition and secure victory.
meanings.sent5: With a sly smile, he overruffed his opponent and claimed the championship.

meanings.definition: To defeat or outdo by using a trump card.
meanings.sent1: He will overruff his rival by playing his secret trump card.
meanings.sent2: The team managed to overruff their opponents with unexpected tactics.
meanings.sent3: She always finds a way to overruff her friends in board games.
meanings.sent4: The underdog overruffed the champions and shocked everyone.
meanings.sent5: With determination, she overruffed all obstacles in her path to success.

meanings.definition: To play a trump card over an opponent's card in a game.
meanings.sent1: I will overruff your move with my strongest card to win the game.
meanings.sent2: Players often try to overruff each other to gain the upper hand.
meanings.sent3: He decided to overruff his friend's move and surprise him.
meanings.sent4: She strategically overruffed her opponent's play and secured victory.
meanings.sent5: With a bold move, he overruffed his rival and claimed the championship title.
